variants.Description in input context: I2020T mutation in the kinase domain

Material used.Description: Experiments on apoptosis induced by hydrogen peroxide and proteolysis inhibitor effects.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T showed impaired protective effect against apoptosis; proteolysis inhibitors restored protective capacity.
Knockdown of wild-type LRRK2 reduced protective capacity against apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 used as a positive control for protective effects.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector or untreated cells used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression above baseline levels (implied by proteolysis inhibitor restoration).

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression below baseline levels (implied by impaired protective effects).

Approved assay.Description: Apoptosis assays are standard for studying neurodegenerative diseases like Parkinson's.
